mapper.select: SELECT password FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.email, u.name, u.nickname, u.phone, u.birth_date AS birthday, u.join_date AS joinDate, ua.gender, ua.occupation, ua.bench_press AS benchPress, ua.squat, ua.deadlift FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_additional_info ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_additional_info WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_additional_info (user_id, gender, occupation, bench_press, squat, deadlift) VALUES (#{userId}, #{gender}, #{occupation}, #{benchPress}, #{squat}, #{deadlift})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET email = #{email}, name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, phone = #{phone}, birth_date = #{birthday} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE user_additional_info SET gender = #{gender}, occupation = #{occupation}, bench_press = #{benchPress}, squat = #{squat}, deadlift = #{deadlift} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
